casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey BOWES. No. 394A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 9, 2005. Jeffrey R. Edwards, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State. Keith A. Williams, Greenville, for Bowes.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of March 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Bowes) shall have up to and including the 20th day of April 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of March 2005."
